/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of red and white, add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
